1: I gain strength and skill to prevail in challenges.
2: I trust my strong protector and lead my people in peace.
3: The divine knows and values every person.
4: Make each day count with purposeful action.
5: Seek transforming support; mountains awaken and new paths emerge.
6: Swift light and precise action secure lasting peace.
7: Help from above lifts you over overwhelming waters.
8: Keep words truthful and actions trustworthy.
9: I sing a new song of praise with joyful music.
10: Devoted service brings victory and protection.
11: Keep company with truthful, trustworthy people.
12: Youth grow strong and graceful, becoming a steadfast foundation.
13: Our storehouses are full and our flocks multiply greatly.
14: Work thrives and communities remain secure, peaceful, and joyful.
15: People thrive when they center their lives on the divine.
